p: So far, many literatures have presented mathematical modeling of the wineglass mode of vibratory gyroscopes with simple structures. Refs. [ 15, 16, 17] presented the in-plane free vibration of a single-crystal silicon ring, Refs. [ 18, 19] presented the detailed model of the semicircular springs supported ring gyroscope, and Refs. [ 11] presented the mathematical modeling of three-dimensional wineglass mode gyroscope. However, as for the complex multiring DRGs, no method has been proposed for the mathematical modeling.
